forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 44F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low near 5C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 42F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 9C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 49F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain tapering to a few showers late. Low 4C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 41F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 45F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds late. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 34F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 32F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High near 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 45F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 37F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High around 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 34F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
